page.title: 20NASSINGTON'S SPECIAL DAYS 85
page.content: {July}FoNS Strawberry Tea-lots of straw berries for sale in school garden.Side shows.220 pounds raised.{August} Nassington and Yarwell Garden Society Annual Flower Show on Playing Field. Prizes for best vegetables,flowers,art work.{September}Church Patronal Festival.Clippen of Church,wine and cheese party at vicarage.Sunday School Bar-b-que.{October}Harvest Festival buffet supper and sale of gifts.FoNS Coffee morning-sale of Chistmas cards, wrapping paper,Christmas gifts. {November}Bonfire Party in School Garden-the last one as we have built gardens to attract wildlife.Ladies Group Craft Evening.{December}Carol Singing around village.FoNS Christmas Fayre.Carol Concert-Y,N Band.School Pantomime-Hansel and Gretel.Carol and Christmas Family Services.{Written by Nassington CP School pupils 1985.}
